description: Structured information about a protocol used in an experiment studying human or animal behavior.
label: Behavioral protocol
name: BehavioralProtocol

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr._instruction: Add all sources in which this behavioral protocol is described in detail.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.label: Described in
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.name: describedIn

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr._instruction: Enter a description of this behavioral protocol.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.description: Longer statement or account giving the characteristics of someone or something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.label: Description
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.name: description

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter._instruction: Enter the identifier (or label) of this behavioral protocol that is used within the corresponding data files to identify this behavioral protocol.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter.description: Term or code that identifies someone or something within a particular product.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter.label: Internal identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter.name: internalIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this behavioral protocol.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.label: Name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.name: name

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/stimu._instruction: Add all stimulation approaches and/or techniques used within this behavioral protocol.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/stimu.label: Stimulation
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/stimu.name: stimulation

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/stimu._instruction: Add all stimulus types used within this behavioral protocol.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/stimu.label: Stimulus type
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/stimu.name: stimulusType
